P.name: Deathbringer Stance
P.description: Periodically, Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus physical damage and heals him, depending on the target's max health.

Q.name: The Darkin Blade
Q.description: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.

W.name: Infernal Chains
W.description: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.

E.name: Umbral Dash
E.description: Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.

R.name: World Ender
R.description: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and movement speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended.

P.name: Essence Theft
P.description: When Ahri strikes 9 enemies with her abilities, her next ability also heals her for each enemy hit.

Q.name: Orb of Deception
Q.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.

W.name: Fox-Fire
W.description: Ahri gains a brief burst of movement speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.

E.name: Charm
E.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.

R.name: Spirit Rush
R.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.

P.name: Assassin's Mark
P.description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next autoattack with bonus range and damage.

Q.name: Five Point Strike
Q.description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage depending on her bonus attack damage and ability power and slowing.

W.name: Twilight Shroud
W.description: Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains movement speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

E.name: Shuriken Flip
E.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.

R.name: Perfect Execution
R.description: Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.

P.name: Dirty Fighting
P.description: Every three hits from Akshan's attacks and abilities deals bonus damage and grants him a shield if the target was a champion. When Akshan attacks, he fires an additional attack for reduced damage. If he cancels the additional attack, he instead gains movement speed.

Q.name: Avengerang
Q.description: Akshan throws a boomerang that deals damage going out and coming back, extending its range each time it hits an enemy.

W.name: Going Rogue
W.description: Akshan passively marks enemy champions as Scoundrels when they kill his ally champions. If Akshan kills a Scoundrel, he resurrects the allies they killed, gains bonus gold, and clears all marks. When activated, Akshan enters camouflage and gains movement speed and mana regeneration while moving towards Scoundrels. Akshan loses the camouflage quickly while he is not in brush or near terrain.

E.name: Heroic Swing
E.description: Akshan fires a grappling hook into terrain then swings around it, repeatedly firing at the nearest enemy while swinging. He can jump off early or gets knocked off when colliding with champions or terrain.

R.name: Comeuppance
R.description: Akshan locks onto an enemy champion and starts storing bullets. When released, he fires all stored bullets, dealing damage depending on missing health to the first champion, minion, or structure hit.

P.name: Triumphant Roar
P.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.

Q.name: Pulverize
Q.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.

W.name: Headbutt
W.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.

E.name: Trample
E.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.

R.name: Unbreakable Will
R.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.

P.name: Cursed Touch
P.description: Amumu's basic attacks Curse his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.

Q.name: Bandage Toss
Q.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.

W.name: Despair
W.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their Curses refreshed.

E.name: Tantrum
E.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by half a second.

R.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
R.description: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his Curse, damaging and stunning them.

P.name: Rebirth
P.description: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.

Q.name: Flash Frost
Q.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.

W.name: Crystallize
W.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.

E.name: Frostbite
E.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing damage. If the target was recently hit by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.

R.name: Glacial Storm
R.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.

P.name: Pyromania
P.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.

Q.name: Disintegrate
Q.description: Annie hurls a mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the mana cost if it destroys the target.

W.name: Incinerate
W.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

E.name: Molten Shield
E.description: Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of movement speed, and damages enemies who attack her with basic attacks.

R.name: Summon: Tibbers
R.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.

aphelios.fullName: Aphelios, the Weapon of the Faithful
aphelios.title: the Weapon of the Faithful
aphelios.name: Aphelios

P.name: Calibrum, the Sniper Rifle
P.description: Passive: Aphelios gains bonus attack range. Abilities that use Calibrum mark targets for a few seconds, revealing them. Aphelios can attack a marked target from long range with his off-hand weapon, causing all nearby marks to be consumed, dealing additional physical damage each to the main target. When Calibrum is assigned, Aphelios can use Moonshot.

P.name: Crescendum, the Chakram
P.description: Passive: Aphelios attacks ricochet off their target and back to Aphelios. Aphelios can attack again immediately after he catches the ricochet. Other abilities that use Crescendum create mirror Chakram which each deal bonus damage when Aphelios attacks. When Crescendum is assigned, Aphelios can use Sentry.

P.name: Gravitum, the Gravity Cannon
P.description: Aphelios' attacks slow targets, decaying over a few seconds. When Gravitum is assigned, Aphelios can use Binding Eclipse.

P.name: Infernum, the Flamethrower
P.description: Aphelios' attacks deal physical damage to the primary target and reduced damage to enemies behind them. This ability is reduced by against minions. When Infernum is assigned, Aphelios can use Duskwave.

P.name: Severum, the Scythe Pistol
P.description: Severum Passive: Attacks and abilities using this weapon restores health. This weapon can heal Aphelios over his max health, granting him a shield for thirty seconds. When Severum is assigned, Aphelios can use Onslaught.

P.name: The Hitman and the Seer
P.description: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique basic attack and ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.

Q.name: Binding Eclipse
Q.description: Aphelios triggers a gravity field on enemies he has slowed with gravitum, rooting for a second and dealing magic damage.

Q.name: Duskwave
Q.description: Aphelios spouts a wave of flame, dealing physical damage. Then he attacks each enemy hit with his off-hand weapon.

Q.name: Moonshot
Q.description: Aphelios fires a long range shot, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and marking them.

Q.name: Onslaught
Q.description: Aphelios gains bonus movement speed and fires both weapons at the nearest enemy for the next a few seconds. Deals physical damage over six shots, prioritizing champions.

Q.name: Sentry
Q.description: Aphelios deploys a lunar sentry equipped with Aphelios' off-hand weapon that lasts for twenty seconds. Sentries activate when an enemy approaches and fire at them, dealing physical damage per shot over four seconds.

W.name: Phase
W.description: Aphelios swaps between his main-hand and off-hand weapons.

R.name: Moonlight Vigil
R.description: Aphelios fires a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes when it hits a champion, dealing physical damage to surrounding enemies. Then, Aphelios attacks all champions hit with his main-hand weapon, applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-han weapon.

R.name: Moonlight Vigil, Calibrum
R.description: Marks added this way deal additional physical damage each when consumed.

R.name: Moonlight Vigil, Crescendum
R.description: Summons an additional 5 mirror Chakrams.

R.name: Moonlight Vigil, Gravitum
R.description: Slow strength increased. Binding Eclipse's Root effect is increased against these targets.

R.name: Moonlight Vigil, Infernum
R.description: The moonlight blast deals additional physical damage, and the subsequent attacks explode, each dealing a percentage of their damage to surrounding targets.

R.name: Moonlight Vigil, Severum
R.description: Aphelios restores health when damaging targets.

P.name: Frost Shot
P.description: Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets. Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

Q.name: Ranger's Focus
Q.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her attack speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.

W.name: Volley
W.description: Ashe fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.

E.name: Hawkshot
E.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.

R.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
R.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy champion, it deals damage and stuns the champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.

P.name: Center of the Universe
P.description: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.

Q.name: Starsurge
Q.description: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.

W.name: Celestial Expansion
W.description: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, increasing their damage and speed.

E.name: Comet of Legend
E.description: Aurelion Sol takes off flying for a long distance.

R.name: Voice of Light
R.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.

azir.fullName: Azir, the Emperor of the Sands
azir.title: the Emperor of the Sands
azir.name: Azir

P.name: Shurima's Legacy
P.description: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

Q.name: Conquering Sands
Q.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for a second.

W.name: Arise!
W.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.

E.name: Shifting Sands
E.description: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.

R.name: Emperor's Divide
R.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.

P.name: Traveler's Call
P.description: Meeps: Bard attracts lesser spirits that assist with his basic attacks to deal extra magic damage. When Bard has collected enough Chimes, his meeps will also deal damage in an area and slow enemies hit. Chimes: Ancient chimes randomly appear for Bard to collect. These grant experience, restore mana, and provide out of combat movement speed.

Q.name: Cosmic Binding
Q.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.

W.name: Caretaker's Shrine
W.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing and speeding up the first ally that touches it.

E.name: Magical Journey
E.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.

R.name: Tempered Fate
R.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.

belveth.fullName: Bel'Veth, The Empress of the Void
belveth.title: The Empress of the Void
belveth.name: Bel'Veth

P.name: Death in Lavender
P.description: Bel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large monsters and champions. She also gains temporary bonus attack speed after using an ability.

Q.name: Void Surge
Q.description: Bel'Veth dashes in a chosen direction and damages all enemies she passes through.

W.name: Above and Below
W.description: Bel'Veth slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies.

E.name: Royal Maelstrom
E.description: Bel'Veth roots herself in place, channeling a storm of slashes around her that targets the lowest-health enemy and grants her lifesteal and damage reduction.

R.name: Endless Banquet
R.description: Bel'Veth consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into a her true form and increasing her max health, attack range, attack speed, and out-of-combat movement speed. Consuming the Void coral remnants of a Void epic monster will grant her a longer ultimate duration, as well as the power to summon Void remora.

P.name: Mana Barrier
P.description: Blitzcrank gains a shield depending on his mana when dropping to low health.

Q.name: Rocket Grab
Q.description: Blitzcrank fires their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them.

W.name: Overdrive
W.description: Blitzcrank super charges themself to get dramatically increased movement and attack speed. They are temporarily slowed after the effect ends.

E.name: Power Fist
E.description: Blitzcrank charges up their fist to make the next attack deal double damage and pop their target up in the air.

R.name: Static Field
R.description: Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly.

P.name: Blaze
P.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

Q.name: Sear
Q.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for a few seconds.

W.name: Pillar of Flame
W.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze takes additional magic damage.

E.name: Conflagration
E.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target that spreads to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration's spread is doubled.

R.name: Pyroclasm
R.description: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of Brand and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.

braum.fullName: Braum, the Heart of the Freljord
braum.title: the Heart of the Freljord
braum.name: Braum

P.name: Concussive Blows
P.description: Braum's basic attacks apply Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, ally basic attacks also stack Concussive Blows. Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is stunned and takes magic damage. For the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks, but take bonus magic damage from Braum's attacks.

Q.name: Winter's Bite
Q.description: Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage. Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

W.name: Stand Behind Me
W.description: Braum leaps to the aid of a nearby ally, positioning himself between his target and their nearest enemy champion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain both bonus armor and magic resist for 3 seconds.

E.name: Unbreakable
E.description: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.

R.name: Glacial Fissure
R.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

P.name: Headshot
P.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

Q.name: Piltover Peacemaker
Q.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for a second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).

W.name: Yordle Snap Trap
W.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for a few seconds, granting Caitlyn an empowered Headshot.

E.name: 90 Caliber Net
E.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.

R.name: Ace in the Hole
R.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.

P.name: Adaptive Defenses
P.description: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to a percentage of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (physical or magic) for a brief duration.

Q.name: Precision Protocol
Q.description: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.

W.name: Tactical Sweep
W.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.

E.name: Hookshot
E.description: Camille pulls herself to a wall, gaining the ability to cast Wall Dive.

E.name: Hookshot / Wall Dive
E.description: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing.

E.name: Wall Dive
E.description: Camille leaps off of a wall, dealing damage and knocks up enemies upon landing.

R.name: Hextech Ultimatum
R.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

P.name: Serpentine Grace
P.description: Cassiopeia gains movement speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots.

Q.name: Noxious Blast
Q.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased movement speed if she hits an enemy champion.

W.name: Miasma
W.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use movement abilities.

E.name: Twin Fang
E.description: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains mana.

R.name: Petrifying Gaze
R.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

chogath.fullName: Cho'Gath, the Terror of the Void
chogath.title: the Terror of the Void
chogath.name: Cho'Gath

P.name: Carnivore
P.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers health and mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

Q.name: Rupture
Q.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.

W.name: Feral Scream
W.description: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and silencing enemies for a few seconds.

E.name: Vorpal Spikes
E.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.

R.name: Feast
R.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum health.

P.name: Hextech Munitions
P.description: A percentage of Corki's basic attack damage is converted into magic damage. Corki can occasionally retrieve The Package inside his base, granting him movement speed and an empowered cast of Valkyrie.

Q.name: Phosphorus Bomb
Q.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

W.name: Valkyrie
W.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.

E.name: Gatling Gun
E.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy armor and magic resist.

R.name: Missile Barrage
R.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a big one, dealing extra damage.

P.name: Hemorrhage
P.description: Darius' attacks and damaging abilities cause enemies to bleed for physical damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Darius enrages and gains massive attack damage when his target reaches max stacks.

P.name: Noxian Might
P.description: Once reaching 5 stacks, Darius enrages and gains massive attack damage when his target reaches max stacks.

Q.name: Decimate
Q.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals depending on enemy champions and large monsters hit by the blade.

W.name: Crippling Strike
W.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their movement speed is slowed.

E.name: Apprehend
E.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

R.name: Noxian Guillotine
R.description: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.

P.name: Moonsilver Blade
P.description: Every third strike cleaves nearby enemies for an additional magic damage. After casting a spell, Diana gains attack speed for her next 3 attacks.

Q.name: Crescent Strike
Q.description: Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing magic damage. Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds.

W.name: Pale Cascade
W.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.

E.name: Lunar Rush
E.description: Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

R.name: Moonfall
R.description: Diana reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and slows them. If Diana pulls in one or more enemy champions, the moonlight crashes down onto her after a short delay, dealing magic damage in an area around her, increased for each target beyond the first pulled.

dr_mundo.fullName: Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun
dr_mundo.title: the Madman of Zaun
dr_mundo.name: Dr. Mundo

P.name: Goes Where He Pleases
P.description: Dr. Mundo resists the first Immobilizing effect that hits thim, instead losing health and dropping a chemical cannister nearby. Dr. Mundo can pick it up by walking over it, restoring health and reducing this ability's cooldown. Dr. Mundo also has significantly increased Health Regeneration.

Q.name: Infected Bonesaw
Q.description: Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw, dealing damage to the first enemy hit depending on their current health and slowing them.

W.name: Heart Zapper
W.description: Dr. Mundo electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, Dr. Mundo deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage.

E.name: Blunt Force Trauma
E.description: Passive: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage, increasing depending on his missing health. Active: Dr. Mundo slams his “medical” bag into an enemy, dealing additional damage depending on his missing health. If the enemy dies they are swatted away, dealing damage to enemies they pass through.

R.name: Maximum Dosage
R.description: Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing health. He then gains bonus attack damage and movement speed, and regenerates a portion of his maximum health over a long duration.

P.name: League of Draven
P.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold depending on how much Adoration he has.

Q.name: Spinning Axe
Q.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

W.name: Blood Rush
W.description: Draven gains increased movement speed and attack speed. The movement speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

E.name: Stand Aside
E.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.

R.name: Whirling Death
R.description: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction. Executes enemies who have less health than Draven's number of Adoration stacks.

ekko.fullName: Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time
ekko.title: the Boy Who Shattered Time
ekko.name: Ekko

P.name: Z-Drive Resonance
P.description: Every third attack or damaging spell on the same target deals bonus magic damage, and grants Ekko a burst of speed if the target is a champion.

Q.name: Timewinder
Q.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.

W.name: Parallel Convergence
W.description: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to low health enemies. He can cast Parallel Convergence to split the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and stuns enemies by suspending them in time.

E.name: Phase Dive
E.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.

R.name: Chronobreak
R.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.

P.name: Spider Queen
P.description: Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling. Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

Q.name: Neurotoxin
Q.description: Deals damage depending upon how high the target's health is.

Q.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
Q.description: Neurotoxin: Elise fires toxin at the target enemy, dealing magic damage, capped against monsters. Venomous Bite: Pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing magic damage, capped against monsters, and applying on-hit effects. If there are active Spiderlings or Volatile Spiderlings nearby, they will dash alongside Elise towards Venomous Bite's target and reprioritize them.

Q.name: Venomous Bite
Q.description: Pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing magic damage, capped against monsters, and applying on-hit effects.

W.name: Skittering Frenzy
W.description: Elise and her Spiderlings gain attack speed.

W.name: Volatile Spiderling
W.description: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

W.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
W.description: Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain attack speed.

E.name: Cocoon
E.description: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

E.name: Cocoon / Rappel
E.description: Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.

E.name: Rappel
E.description: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.

R.name: Human Form
R.description: Elise returns to Human Form and all remaining Spiderlings become dormant. Spiderlings deal magic damage and take reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

R.name: Spider Form
R.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.

R.name: Spider Form / Human Form
R.description: Human Form: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes. Spider Form: Elise returns to Human Form and all remaining Spiderlings become dormant. Spiderlings deal magic damage and take reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

P.name: Demon Shade
P.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

Q.name: Hate Spike
Q.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.

W.name: Allure
W.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

E.name: Empowered Whiplash
E.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains Move Speed for a short duration.

E.name: Whiplash
E.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.

R.name: Last Caress
R.description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.

P.name: Rising Spell Force
P.description: Ezreal gains increasing attack speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

Q.name: Mystic Shot
Q.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.

W.name: Essence Flux
W.description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.

E.name: Arcane Shift
E.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.

R.name: Trueshot Barrage
R.description: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).

P.name: A Harmless Scarecrow
P.description: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.

Q.name: Terrify
Q.description: Fiddlesticks damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.

W.name: Bountiful Harvest
W.description: Fiddlesticks drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration.

E.name: Reap
E.description: Fiddlesticks slashes an area with its scythe, slowing all enemies hit and silencing enemies hit in the center of the slash.

R.name: Crowstorm
R.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

P.name: Duelist's Dance
P.description: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

Q.name: Lunge
Q.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

W.name: Riposte
W.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

E.name: Bladework
E.description: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.

R.name: Grand Challenge
R.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.

P.name: Nimble Fighter
P.description: Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources.

Q.name: Urchin Strike
Q.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.

W.name: Seastone Trident
W.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.

E.name: Playful / Trickster
E.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.

R.name: Chum the Waters
R.description: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.

P.name: Colossal Smash
P.description: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.

Q.name: Winds of War
Q.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time.

W.name: Shield of Durand
W.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.

E.name: Justice Punch
E.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.

R.name: Hero's Entrance
R.description: Galio designates an ally's position as his landing spot, granting all allies in the area a magic shield. After a delay Galio smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.

P.name: Trial By Fire
P.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

Q.name: Parrrley
Q.description: Shoots target, plundering gold for each enemy unit killed.

W.name: Remove Scurvy
W.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore health.

E.name: Powder Keg
E.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

R.name: Cannon Barrage
R.description: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

P.name: Perseverance
P.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.

Q.name: Decisive Strike
Q.description: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.

W.name: Courage
W.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.

E.name: Judgment
E.description: Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

R.name: Demacian Justice
R.description: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion.

P.name: Rage Gene
P.description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

Q.name: Boomerang Throw
Q.description: Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Q.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
Q.description: Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced. Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.

Q.name: Boulder Toss
Q.description: Throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.

W.name: Hyper
W.description: Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him movement speed.

W.name: Hyper / Wallop
W.description: Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him movement speed. Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.

W.name: Wallop
W.description: Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.

E.name: Crunch
E.description: Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

E.name: Hop
E.description: Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

E.name: Hop / Crunch
E.description: Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further. Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.

R.name: GNAR!
R.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.

P.name: Happy Hour
P.description: Gragas periodically heals upon using a skill.

Q.name: Barrel Roll
Q.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. The potency of the explosion increases over time. Enemies struck by the blast have their movement speed slowed.

W.name: Drunken Rage
W.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.

E.name: Body Slam
E.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.

R.name: Explosive Cask
R.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.

P.name: New Destiny
P.description: Graves' shotgun has some unique properties. He must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attacks fire 4 bullets, which cannot pass through units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back.

Q.name: End of the Line
Q.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after a few seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.

W.name: Smoke Screen
W.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their movement speed reduced briefly.

E.name: Quickdraw
E.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.

R.name: Collateral Damage
R.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.

P.name: Thousand Cuts
P.description: Gwen's attacks deal bonus magic damage depending on the targets health. She heals for a portion of the damage dealt to champions by this effect.

Q.name: Snip Snip!
Q.description: Gwen snips her scissors in a cone up to 6 times dealing magic damage. Gwen deals true damage to units in the center and applies her passive to them on each snip.

W.name: Hallowed Mist
W.description: Gwen summons mist that protects her from enemies outside of it. She can only be targeted by enemies who enter the mist.

E.name: Skip 'n Slash
E.description: Gwen dashes a short distance then gains attack speed, attack range, and magic damage on-hit for a few seconds. If she hits an enemy during that time, this ability's cooldown is partially refunded.

R.name: Needlework
R.description: Gwen hurls a needle that slows enemies hit, deals magic damage, and applies A Thousand Cuts to champions hit. This ability can be cast up to two more times, with each cast throwing additional needles and dealing more damage. Gwen must hit an enemy between each cast to unlock the next one.

P.name: Warpath
P.description: Hecarim gains attack damage equal to a percentage of his bonus movement speed.

Q.name: Rampage
Q.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage. If Hecarim damages at least one enemy, he increases the damage and lowers the cooldown of subsequent Rampages.

W.name: Spirit of Dread
W.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.

E.name: Devastating Charge
E.description: Hecarim gains increasing movement speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage depending on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.

R.name: Onslaught of Shadows
R.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

P.name: Hextech Affinity
P.description: Gain movement speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

Q.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
Q.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).

Q.name: H-28Q Apex Turret
Q.description: Places a Turret that deals magic damage with its cannon and its beam for 8 seconds.

W.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
W.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.

W.name: Hextech Rocket Swarm
W.description: Fires 4 waves that deal magic damage. Champions and monsters hit by multiple rockets take reduced damage.

E.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
E.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.

E.name: CH-3X Lightning Grenade
E.description: Throws a grenade that discharges three times, dealing magic damage and exploding in a larger area each time. Enemies hit are slowed by 80%.

R.name: UPGRADE!!!
R.description: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.

P.name: Prophet of an Elder God
P.description: Illaoi and the Vessels she creates, spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, Vessels and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

Q.name: Tentacle Smash
Q.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

W.name: Harsh Lesson
W.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

E.name: Test of Spirit
E.description: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.

R.name: Leap of Faith
R.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.

P.name: Ionian Fervor
P.description: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus attack speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.

Q.name: Bladesurge
Q.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.

W.name: Defiant Dance
W.description: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.

E.name: Flawless Duet
E.description: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and marked.

R.name: Vanguard's Edge
R.description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it.

P.name: Friend of the Forest
P.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

Q.name: Rootcaller
Q.description: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.

W.name: Brushmaker
W.description: In brush, Ivern's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

E.name: Triggerseed
E.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.

R.name: Daisy!
R.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.

P.name: Tailwind
P.description: Janna gains bonus movement speed moving towards allied champions and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her.

Q.name: Howling Gale
Q.description: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.

W.name: Zephyr
W.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her movement speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's movement speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.

E.name: Eye Of The Storm
E.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their attack damage.

R.name: Monsoon
R.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.

jarvan_iv.fullName: Jarvan IV, the Exemplar of Demacia
jarvan_iv.title: the Exemplar of Demacia
jarvan_iv.name: Jarvan IV

P.name: Martial Cadence
P.description: Jarvan's first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage depending on their current health. This effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few seconds.

Q.name: Dragon Strike
Q.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.

W.name: Golden Aegis
W.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.

E.name: Demacian Standard
E.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus attack speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants attack speed to nearby allied champions.

R.name: Cataclysm
R.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.

P.name: Relentless Assault
P.description: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his attack speed.

Q.name: Leap Strike
Q.description: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.

W.name: Empower
W.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.

E.name: Counter Strike
E.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.

R.name: Grandmaster's Might
R.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional magic damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his armor and magic resist for a short duration.

P.name: Hextech Capacitor
P.description: Jayce can swap between melee and ranged weapons using Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer starting from level 1. Swapping weapons also swaps all his abilities and grants him movement speed for less than a second.

Q.name: Shock Blast
Q.description: Jayce fires an orb of electricity, dealing physical damage to the first enemy hit and all surrounding enemies. Firing this orb through Acceleration Gate increases the range, speed and increases the damage by a percentage.

Q.name: To The Skies!
Q.description: Jayce leaps to an enemy, dealing physical damage to surrounding enemies and slowing them for a few seconds.

Q.name: To The Skies! / Shock Blast
Q.description: Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies. Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.

W.name: Hyper Charge
W.description: Jayce overcharges his cannon, gaining maximum attack speed for his next 3 attacks. These attacks deal physical damage.

W.name: Lightning Field
W.description: Passive: Jayce's Hammer attacks grant mana. Active: Jayce creates an electric aura dealing magic damage over a few seconds.

W.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
W.description: Mercury Hammer Passive: Jayce's Hammer attacks grant mana. Mercury Hammer Active: Jayce creates an electric aura dealing magic damage over a few seconds. Mercury Cannon: Jayce overcharges his cannon, gaining maximum attack speed for his next 3 attacks. These attacks deal physical damage.

E.name: Acceleration Gate
E.description: Jayce deploys an acceleration gate for a few seconds that grants movement speed decaying over a few seconds to allied champions that pass through it.

E.name: Thundering Blow
E.description: Jayce swings his hammer, knocking back his target and dealing magic damage.

E.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
E.description: Mercury Hammer: Jayce swings his hammer, knocking back his target and dealing magic damage. Mercury Cannon: Jayce deploys an acceleration gate for a few seconds that grants movement speed decaying over a few seconds to allied champions that pass through it.

R.name: Mercury Cannon
R.description: Jayce transforms his weapon into the Mercury Cannon, gaining attack range and new abilities. Jayce's next attack removes armor and magic resist for 5 seconds.

R.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
R.description: Mercury Cannon: Jayce transforms his weapon into the Mercury Hammer, becoming melee ranged and gaining new abilities, armor and magic resist. Jayce's next attack deals additional magic damage. Mercury Hammer: Jayce transforms his weapon into the Mercury Cannon, gaining attack range and new abilities. Jayce's next attack removes armor and magic resist for a few seconds.

R.name: Mercury Hammer
R.description: Jayce transforms his weapon into the Mercury Hammer, becoming melee ranged and gaining new abilities, armor and magic resist. Jayce's next attack deals additional magic damage.

P.name: Whisper
P.description: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.

Q.name: Dancing Grenade
Q.description: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.

W.name: Deadly Flourish
W.description: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or damaged by Jhin, they are rooted.

E.name: Captive Audience
E.description: Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals. Beauty in Death: When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.

R.name: Curtain Call
R.description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.

P.name: Get Excited!
P.description: Jinx receives massively increased movement speed and attack speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.

Q.name: Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher
Q.description: Jinx's attacks deal a percentage of attack damage as physical damage to the target and nearby enemies, gains bonus attack range, costs mana per rocket and scales less with bonus attack speed.

Q.name: Pow-Pow, the Minigun
Q.description: Jinx's attacks grant attack speed for a few seconds.

Q.name: Switcheroo!
Q.description: Jinx swaps weapons between Fishbones the rocket launcher and Pow-Pow the minigun. While using the rocket launcher, Jinx's attacks deal a percentage of attack damage as physical damage to the target and nearby enemies, gains bonus attack range, costs mana per rocket and scales less with bonus attack speed. While using the minigun, Jinx's attacks grant attack speed for a few seconds.

W.name: Zap!
W.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

E.name: Flame Chompers!
E.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after a few seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

R.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
R.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies depending on their missing health.

P.name: Dauntless Instinct
P.description: K'Sante's damaging abilities mark enemies hit for a short duration. Attacking a marked enemy consumes the mark to deal physical damage. All Out: Mark consumption damage is converted to true damage. The entire attack is increased by a percentage.

Q.name: Ntofo Strikes
Q.description: K’Sante slams his weapon down, dealing physical damage and briefly slowing the enemies struck. When an enemy is hit, K’Sante gains a stack of Ntofo Strikes for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, K’Sante instead fires a shockwave that stuns and pulls enemies for a second. All Out: This ability’s cooldown is reduced by a second and no longer inflicts slow.

W.name: Path Maker
W.description: Begin Charging: K’Sante raises his weapons defensively for up to a second, becoming unstoppable and reducing incoming damage. Release: K’Sante rams forward, dealing physical damage depending on charge time. K’Sante knocks back and stuns enemies for a short duration. All Out: This ability’s cooldown is refreshed. This ability will no longer knock back or stun. This ability’s damage reduction is increased, it deals additional physical damage and its charge and dash speed are doubled.

E.name: Footwork
E.description: K’Sante dashes, gaining a shield for a few seconds. If dashing to an ally, the distance of the dash is significantly increased and the ally is also shielded. All Out: This ability’s dash speed is increased. Dashing without an ally has increased range and can go over walls.

R.name: All Out
R.description: K’Sante shatters his ntofos, dealing physical damage and knocking back an enemy champion. Enemies that hit a wall instead take a different amount of physical damage, are knocked back over the wall, and are briefly stunned. K’Sante then dashes after the enemy and goes All Out for 20 seconds. All Out: K’Sante loses max health, bonus armor and bonus magic resistance. In return K’Sante gains attack damage, omnivamp and transforms his abilities.

P.name: Second Skin
P.description: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.

Q.name: Icathian Rain
Q.description: Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets. Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles.

W.name: Void Seeker
W.description: Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive. Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.

E.name: Supercharge
E.description: Kai'Sa briefly increases her movement speed, then increases her attack speed. Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant invisibility.

R.name: Killer Instinct
R.description: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.

P.name: Martial Poise
P.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

Q.name: Pierce
Q.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

W.name: Sentinel
W.description: Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

E.name: Rend
E.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

R.name: Fate's Call
R.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

P.name: Gathering Fire
P.description: Karma's damaging abilities will reduce the cooldown of Mantra.

Q.name: Inner Flame
Q.description: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit. Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

Q.name: Soulflare
Q.description: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

W.name: Focused Resolve
W.description: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again. Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

W.name: Renewal
W.description: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

E.name: Defiance
E.description: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

E.name: Inspire
E.description: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the movement speed of the protected ally. Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

R.name: Mantra
R.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

P.name: Death Defied
P.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.

Q.name: Lay Waste
Q.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies.

W.name: Wall of Pain
W.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their movement speed and magic resist reduced for a period.

E.name: Defile
E.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.

R.name: Requiem
R.description: After channeling for a few seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.

P.name: Void Stone
P.description: Kassadin takes reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

Q.name: Null Sphere
Q.description: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

W.name: Nether Blade
W.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores mana.

E.name: Force Pulse
E.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

R.name: Riftwalk
R.description: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

P.name: Voracity
P.description: Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged recently, her remaining ability cooldowns are dramatically reduced. If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

Q.name: Bouncing Blades
Q.description: Katarina throws a dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

W.name: Preparation
W.description: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.

E.name: Shunpo
E.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

R.name: Death Lotus
R.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

P.name: Divine Ascent
P.description: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains attack speed, movement speed, attack range, and waves of fire on her attacks.

Q.name: Radiant Blast
Q.description: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.

W.name: Celestial Blessing
W.description: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants movement speed to herself and the nearest ally.

E.name: Starfire Spellblade
E.description: Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks. Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.

R.name: Divine Judgment
R.description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.

P.name: The Darkin Scythe
P.description: Once he has dealt enough damage to champions, Kayn can assume one of two forms, based on whether he has damaged more melee or ranged champions. The form he assumes changes his abilities.

P.name: The Darkin Scythe: Rhaast
P.description: Rhaast heals for a percentage of the damage that he deals with spells against enemy champions.

P.name: The Darkin Scythe: Shadow Assassin
P.description: Kayn's basic attacks and abilities deal bonus magic damage, lasting for 3 seconds upon entering in combat with an enemy champion, refreshing after 8 seconds out of combat with them or by using Umbral Trespass.

Q.name: Reaping Slash
Q.description: Kayn dashes forward, dealing physical damage to all enemies he passes through before flourishing his scythe, dealing the same damage again to surrounding enemies. Both instances of Reaping Slash deal bonus damage against minions and monsters.

Q.name: Reaping Slash: Rhaast
Q.description: Kayn dashes forward, dealing physical damage to all enemies he passes through before flourishing his scythe, dealing the same damage again to surrounding enemies.

Q.name: Reaping Slash: Shadow Assassin
Q.description: Kayn dashes forward, dealing physical damage to all enemies he passes through before flourishing his scythe, dealing the same damage again to surrounding enemies.

W.name: Blade's Reach
W.description: After a short delay in which he can't perform any other actions, Kayn performs an upwards sweep with his scythe, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line and slowing them.

W.name: Blade's Reach: Rhaast
W.description: After a short delay in which he can't perform any other actions, Kayn performs an upwards sweep with his scythe, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line, knocking them up and slowing them.

W.name: Blade's Reach: Shadow Assassin
W.description: After a short delay, Kayn conjures a living shadow at his casting position that performs an upwards sweep with its scythe, dealing physical damage to all enemies in a line and slowing them.

E.name: Shadow Step
E.description: Kayn gains bonus movement speed, is ghosted and can ignore terrain collision for 1.5 seconds. Immobilizing effects will interrupt Shadow Step. Kayn heals himself upon moving through terrain for the first time and, if he's not in combat with enemy champions, Shadow Step's duration is increased. Entering combat with a champion after the effect is enhanced reduces the remaining duration to 1.5 seconds.

E.name: Shadow Step: Rhaast
E.description: Kayn gains bonus movement speed, is ghosted and can ignore terrain collision for 1.5 seconds. Immobilizing effects will interrupt Shadow Step. Kayn heals himself upon moving through terrain for the first time and, if he's not in combat with enemy champions, Shadow Step's duration is increased to 5 seconds. Entering combat with a champion after the effect is enhanced reduces the remaining duration to 1.5 seconds.

E.name: Shadow Step: Shadow Assassin
E.description: Kayn gains bonus movement speed, is ghosted and can ignore terrain collision for 1.5 seconds. Immobilizing effects will interrupt Shadow Step. Kayn heals himself upon moving through terrain for the first time and, if he's not in combat with enemy champions, Shadow Step's duration is increased. Entering combat with a champion after the effect is enhanced reduces the remaining duration to 1.5 seconds.

R.name: Umbral Trespass
R.description: Kayn's basic attacks and abilities mark enemy champions for a few seconds. Kayn can activate Umbral Trespass to infest a marked enemy champion, revealing them and becoming untargetable for the duration. Upon reactivation or at the end of the duration, Kayn wrenches free from their body in the cursor's direction, dealing physical damage to the target.

R.name: Umbral Trespass: Rhaast
R.description: Kayn's basic attacks and abilities mark enemy champions for a few seconds. Kayn can activate Umbral Trespass to infest a marked enemy champion, revealing them and becoming untargetable for the duration. Upon reactivation or at the end of the duration, Kayn wrenches free from their body in the cursor's direction, dealing physical damage to the target.

R.name: Umbral Trespass: Shadow Assassin
R.description: Kayn's basic attacks and abilities mark enemy champions for a few seconds. Kayn can activate Umbral Trespass to infest a marked enemy champion, revealing them and becoming untargetable for the duration. Upon reactivation or at the end of the duration, Kayn wrenches free from their body in the cursor's direction, dealing physical damage to the target.

kennen.fullName: Kennen, the Heart of the Tempest
kennen.title: the Heart of the Tempest
kennen.name: Kennen

P.name: Mark of the Storm
P.description: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.

Q.name: Thundering Shuriken
Q.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

W.name: Electrical Surge
W.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

E.name: Lightning Rush
E.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains movement speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.

R.name: Slicing Maelstrom
R.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.

P.name: Unseen Threat
P.description: Nearby enemies that are Isolated from their allies are marked. Kha'Zix's abilities have interactions with Isolated targets When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds.

Q.name: Taste Their Fear
Q.description: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

W.name: Void Spike
W.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.

E.name: Leap
E.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

R.name: Void Assault
R.description: Each rank of Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his active abilities, granting it an additional effect. Upon activation, Kha'Zix enters stealth and gains Unseen Threat, increasing Movement Speed. Kha'Zix can cast Void Assault again for a short time after activation. Evolving active camouflage allows Kha'Zix to cast Void Assault three times over the course of its duration and increases the duration of the stealth.

P.name: Mark of the Kindred
P.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

Q.name: Dance of Arrows
Q.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

W.name: Wolf's Frenzy
W.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him. Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.

E.name: Mounting Dread
E.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

R.name: Lamb's Respite
R.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

P.name: Skaarl the Cowardly Lizard
P.description: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts. While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

Q.name: Beartrap on a Rope
Q.description: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled. When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

Q.name: Beartrap on a Rope / Pocket Pistol
Q.description: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled. When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

Q.name: Pocket Pistol
Q.description: Dismounted: Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

W.name: Violent Tendencies
W.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

E.name: Jousting
E.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.

R.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
R.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

kogmaw.fullName: Kog'Maw, the Mouth of the Abyss
kogmaw.title: the Mouth of the Abyss
kogmaw.name: Kog'Maw

P.name: Icathian Surprise
P.description: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.

Q.name: Caustic Spittle
